nodes.text: Star Traders, also known as Star Traders Boutique, is a store in Disneyland Paris that focuses on selling Star Wars and Star Tours merchandise, including souvenirs, clothing and toys—many that are exclusive to Disney Parks. Located in the park's Discoveryland, the store also sells Disney and science fiction themed merchandise, and features high-tech decor.
Disneyland in California has a similar store called The Star Trader.
